name: User can see the detail page of each product -- @1.3

steps.name: Given I am logged in as a user with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
When I visit the inventory page
And I click on the product with name "Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt"

Then I should see the detail page of the product wit all its content and the correct product name "Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt", "$15.99", "Get your testing superhero on with the Sauce Labs bolt T-shirt. From American Apparel, 100% ringspun combed cotton, heather gray with red bolt."

parameters.name: description
parameters.value: Get your testing superhero on with the Sauce Labs bolt T-shirt. From American Apparel, 100% ringspun combed cotton, heather gray with red bolt.

fullName: Detail page functionallity test: User can see the detail page of each product
